meanings.sent1: After dinner, my mom always takes care of the dishwashings.
meanings.sent2: I don't mind doing the dishwashings after a meal.
meanings.sent3: The dishwashings seemed to never end, but at least the plates sparkled.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the dishwashings was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The sound of dishwashings in the background was oddly soothing.

meanings.definition: The process of cleaning dishes in a dishwasher.
meanings.sent1: Modern dishwashings machines make life so much easier.
meanings.sent2: I prefer handwashing over using dishwashings for my dishes.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity led to a hilarious encounter with the dishwashings.
meanings.sent4: The efficiency of the dishwashings amazed everyone in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The sparkling clean dishes were a result of the powerful dishwashings cycle.
